department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: The intersection was restricted in order to ensure safety and traffic precautions during the truck move-in period.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by March 11, 2024 at 1400 EST. All bids submitted after 1400 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide confectionary / food items as required to Edmonton Institution for Women to Correctional Service Canada.
full_summary:
### Canteen Products RISO-D Tender Invitation

#### Tender Information
**Reference Number:** WS4138609713
**Notice Publication Date:** February 22, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** March 11, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
**Original Amendment Date:** February 22, 2024
**Tender Status:** CANCELLED

#### Tender Details
**Tender Name:** Canteen Products RISO-D
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
**UNSPSC Classification:** 50192100 - Snack foods
**Regions of Delivery:** Edmonton, Canada

#### Procurement Entity
**Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**
**Address:** 11 Laurier Street, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
**End-User Entities:** Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)
**Address:** 340 Laurier Avenue West, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 0P9, Canada

#### Contact Information
**Contact Name:** Lee, Oana (SPAC/PSPC)
**Email:** [oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
**Phone:** Not specified

#### Access to the Tender
The tender details can be accessed at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18877268?extsite=MTg4NzcyNjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18877268?extsite=MTg4NzcyNjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
